name: Burst Strike
entries: When you choose this archetype at 2nd level, you can use the bullets loaded in your firearms to bolster your attacks. As a part of an attack on your turn with a barrel firearm, you can expend 1 bullet from your firearmâ€™s barrel to deal an additional {@dice 1d10} Fire damage, in addition to the weapons normal damage. If you miss your attack, the bullet is still consumed.
This damage increases as you gain levels in this class,growing to {@dice 2d10} at level 11.
